CmdLine: apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps     automake=1.16.1-r0     bash=4.4.19-r1     icu-dev=60.2-r2     postgresql-dev=10.5-r0     libjpeg-turbo-dev=1.5.3-r4     libpng-dev=1.6.34-r1
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: docker-php-ext-install         bcmath         gd         intl         pdo_pgsql     && pecl install         grpc         redis         xdebug-"${XDEBUG_VERSION}"     && docker-php-ext-enable         grpc         redis
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -sSL "${JPEGOPTIM_URL}" | tar -xz -C /usr/src/jpegoptim --strip-components 1     && ./configure     && make     && make strip     && make install     && rm -rf /usr/src/jpegoptim
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -sSL "${OPTIPNG_URL}" | tar -xz -C /usr/src/optipng --strip-components 1     && ./configure     && make     && make install     && rm -rf /usr/src/optipng
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -sSL "${PNGQUANT_URL}" | tar -xz -C /usr/src/pngquant --strip-components 1     && ./configure     && make     && make install     && rm -rf /usr/src/pngquant
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -sSL "${GIFSICLE_URL}" | tar -xz -C /usr/src/gifsicle --strip-components 1     && autoreconf -i     && ./configure     && make     && make install     && rm -rf /usr/src/gifsicle
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apk add --no-cache --virtual .persistent-lib-deps     $(         scanelf --needed --nobanner --format '%n#p' --recursive /usr/local/lib/php/extensions         | tr ',' '\n'         | sort -u         | awk 'system("[ -e /usr/local/lib/" $1 " ]") == 0 { next } { print "so:" $1 }'     )
Commands.Name: run
